title: The island queens, or, The death of Mary, Queen of Scotland a tragedy : publish'd only in defence of the author and the play, against some mistaken censures, occasion'd by its being prohibited the stage / by Jo. Banks.
author: Banks, John, d. 1706.
notes: Imperfect? Epilogue by Joseph Haines, wanting? Cf. Genest, p. 423; DNB; Dobell's "Literature of the restoration" gives 8 prelim. pages.
Produced in 1704 under title: The Albion queens.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
